title: I'm busy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Make a player busy at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Busy players are roleblocked, and cannot send whispers the night after being made busy.
- Roleblock immunity
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the Town loses the game (this can win while dead).

desc:
Post 4691
*I'm too busy to make a role continuing the series so you get this instead.*
